shape.description: Shape of the new array, e.g., (2, 3) or 2.

dtype.description: The desired data-type for the array  The default, None, meansnp.array(fill_value).dtype.

order.description: Whether to store multidimensional data in C- or Fortran-contiguous (row- or column-wise) order in memory.

out.description: Array of fill_value with the given shape, dtype, and order.
